usage.dau_mau.rationale: The stickiness is calculated to be 0.0, indicating a significant failure in user engagement with no active users in the last 30 days. This requires urgent action to address the severe drop in activity.

actions.action: Investigate reasons for user inactivity
Implement re-engagement campaigns for existing users
Analyze user feedback to identify pain points
Enhance product features based on user needs
Monitor user activity closely for improvements

usage.creators_ratio.rationale: The creator share is less than 8%, indicating a significant failure in engagement and usage of creator roles. Immediate action is required to address this critical issue.

actions.action: Implement targeted outreach to convert viewers to creators
Develop and promote creator onboarding resources
Host workshops to demonstrate the value of being a creator

usage.session_depth.rationale: The average session duration and page depth are significantly below target, indicating a critical failure in user engagement.

actions.action: Investigate user engagement strategies to increase session duration
Enhance content quality to encourage more page views
Implement user feedback mechanisms to identify pain points
Analyze user behavior to tailor content offerings
Consider promotional campaigns to drive user interest

usage.drilldown.rationale: Drill actions were not present in any of the sessions, indicating a significant failure in engagement with drill features.

actions.action: Implement training sessions to educate users on drill features
Enhance visibility of drill options in the user interface
Gather user feedback to identify barriers to using drill features

reliability.refresh_timeliness.rationale: The dashboard has not been refreshed since August 12, 2025, while the current date is August 15, 2025, indicating a significant failure to meet the weekly SLA. This results in chronic staleness.

actions.action: Refresh the stale dashboard immediately
Investigate the cause of the refresh failure
Implement monitoring for dashboard refresh status
Set up alerts for overdue dashboard refreshes
Review and optimize the dashboard refresh process

features.cross_links.rationale: None of the dashboards have links, indicating a significant failure in cross-linking and urgent action is required.

actions.action: Implement links on all dashboards
Train users on the importance of cross-linking
Monitor link usage and adjust strategy accordingly

governance.coverage.rationale: The dashboard is not certified, has no assigned owner, and lacks any metadata, indicating a significant failure in governance coverage.

actions.action: Certify the dashboard
Assign an owner to the dashboard
Develop and complete metadata for the dashboard

data.source_diversity.rationale: Only a single source is present, indicating a critical lack of diversity and significant risk to data reliability and insights.

actions.action: Identify and integrate additional data sources across multiple domains

democratization.self_service.rationale: There are no creators among the users, indicating a significant failure in creator engagement and urgent action is required to address this issue.

actions.action: Identify potential creators and provide training
Implement incentives for creator participation
Conduct outreach to departments to promote creator roles

decision.traceability.rationale: Less than 15% of decisions are linked to dashboards, and there is no evidence provided to support any decision-making process.
gaps: Evidence of dashboard links for decisions

actions.action: Implement a mandatory requirement for linking decisions to dashboards
Provide training on the importance of evidence in decision-making
Establish a review process for decision logs to ensure compliance
